author: Blake Schuster
title: Ex-Cardinals OF Jim Edmonds Confirms He Has Coronavirus After Hospitalization
description: Four-time MLB All-Star and 2006 World Series champion Jim Edmonds announced he has been diagnosed with COVID-19 after falling ill last week...
content:
Jeff Roberson/Associated Press
Four-time MLB All-Star and 2006 World Series champion Jim Edmonds announced he was diagnosed with COVID-19 after falling ill last week. 
In an Instagram story on Wednesday night, Edmonds gave a follow-up to the story he posted… [+468 chars]
